news.title: New AI Research Lab Opens
news.content: The Computer Science Department is pleased to announce the opening of a new state-of-the-art AI Research Laboratory. The facility will support cutting-edge research in machine learning and natural language processing.
news.author: University Communications

news.title: Guest Lecture: Future of Web Development
news.content: Join us for an exciting guest lecture by industry expert Dr. Alexandra Smith on the future of web technologies, including WebAssembly, Progressive Web Apps, and serverless architecture.
news.author: CS Department

news.title: Hackathon Winners Announced
news.content: Congratulations to Team ByteBuilders for winning the annual MSc Computer Science Hackathon with their innovative healthcare monitoring application using IoT and cloud technologies.
news.author: Student Activities Office

news.title: Spring Semester Registration Now Open
news.content: Registration for Spring Semester elective courses is now open. Students are encouraged to review the course catalog and register early as some popular courses fill up quickly.
news.author: Academic Registry
